name: Cold Breath of Nature
description:
Welcome to my little protoype for this jam! I wanted to try out new shaders and combine some tutorials I used before the jam. Also this game style is inspired by Animal Crossing because for me this game is pure cozy.

The prototype of my game idea includes just a little intro sequence because I made it by my own and I am more focused on game art then coding. 

I hope you still enjoy it and may give me some feedback. :)

I used these tutorials:

https://answers.unity.com/questions/1820188/toon-shader-using-surface-shader.htm...

I used 2 sounds to make a little atmosphere for the jam:

https://freesound.org/people/barkenov/sounds/640655/

https://freesound.org/people/Setuniman/sounds/171394/

The Animal Crossing like dialogue audio was made by me with my voice and audacity. X)

---This prototype is only for educational  use for me to get some feedback---
